name: Dubstep Maker EDM
description:
Create amazing sounding Dubstep / EDM music with our free Dubstep Maker.

= Features =
* 38 EDITABLE pads
* 128 powerful HD Drum Loops, Synth Loops, FX, Vocals
* 8 key synth with an insane wobble adjuster
* Individual volume control AND master volume control
* Tempo adjuster for Drum Loops, Synth Loops, Vocals and FX.
* Built-in Metronome

" Hands down the easiest to use Dubstep / EDM maker with editable pads I've used so far! "

" WOW, truly amazing app tones of features and great layout. Makes it easy to make sick drops! "

Captivate your live listening audience with powerful high quality Dubstep sounds using Dubstep Maker EDM.

Thank you so much for being our customer. We appreciate each and every download and Review.

Available in English, Russian, Spanish, German, Japanese, Italian, and French.
